channel.title: Time Synch issue
channel.description:
Hello, I seem to have some problem (the same problem both on Gateway and Workstation) with fetching the time from TOR, that is: running the time syncronization monitor. It gives me an error and just waits 10 minutes. Here the log taken from the gateway (I am using VirtualBox in MacOSX). Thank you very much in advance for any help. 2018-01-15 22:03:17,501 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Signal SIGTERM received. sdwdate stopped by user. 2018-01-15 22:03:17,800 - sdwdate.log - INFO - sdwdate started. PID 23668 2018-01-15 22:03:17,811 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Tor socks host: 127.0.0.1 Tor socks port: 9108 2018-01-15 22:03:17,937 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Fetching remote times, start Mon Jan 15 22:03:17 UTC 2018 (unixtime 1516053797.94) 2018-01-15 22:03:17,939 - sdwdate.log - INFO - The clock is sane Current time Mon Jan 15 22:03:17 UTC 2018 2018-01-15 22:03:17,940 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Fetching remote times...
For better security and anonymity, ideally please do not use the internet until initial time fetching succeeded. 2018-01-15 22:03:17,940 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Running sdwdate loop, iteration 1 2018-01-15 22:03:17,940 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Requested urls ['vbmwh445kf3fs2v4.onion', 'acabtd4btrxjjrvr.onion', 'bitmailendavkbec.onion'] 2018-01-15 22:03:37,962 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Returned urls "['vbmwh445kf3fs2v4.onion', 'acabtd4btrxjjrvr.onion', 'bitmailendavkbec.onion']" 2018-01-15 22:03:37,962 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Remote status "vbmwh445kf3fs2v4.onion", False: Timeout 2018-01-15 22:03:37,962 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Remote status "acabtd4btrxjjrvr.onion", False: Timeout 2018-01-15 22:03:37,963 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Remote status "bitmailendavkbec.onion", True 2018-01-15 22:03:37,963 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Pool 3 last url: bitmailendavkbec.onion, web unixtime: 1516046327, web time: Mon Jan 15 19:58:47 UTC 2018, diff: -7490 seconds 2018-01-15 22:03:37,963 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Running sdwdate loop, iteration 2 2018-01-15 22:03:37,963 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Requested urls ['dqeasamlf3jld2kz.onion', 'abkjckdgoabr7bmm.onion'] 2018-01-15 22:03:57,980 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Returned urls "['dqeasamlf3jld2kz.onion', 'abkjckdgoabr7bmm.onion']" 2018-01-15 22:03:57,980 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Remote status "dqeasamlf3jld2kz.onion", False: Timeout 2018-01-15 22:03:57,980 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Remote status "abkjckdgoabr7bmm.onion", False: Timeout 2018-01-15 22:03:57,982 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Running sdwdate loop, iteration 3 2018-01-15 22:03:57,982 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Requested urls ['n572ltkg4nld3bsz.onion', 'bqs3dobnazs7h4u4.onion'] 2018-01-15 22:04:11,590 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Returned urls "['n572ltkg4nld3bsz.onion', 'bqs3dobnazs7h4u4.onion']" 2018-01-15 22:04:11,590 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Remote status "n572ltkg4nld3bsz.onion", False: Timeout 2018-01-15 22:04:11,590 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Remote status "bqs3dobnazs7h4u4.onion", True 2018-01-15 22:04:11,590 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Pool 2 last url: bqs3dobnazs7h4u4.onion, web unixtime: 1516046373, web time: Mon Jan 15 19:59:33 UTC 2018, diff: -7478 seconds 2018-01-15 22:04:11,590 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Running sdwdate loop, iteration 4 2018-01-15 22:04:11,590 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Requested urls ['swdi5ymnwmrqhycl.onion'] 2018-01-15 22:04:21,597 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Returned urls "['swdi5ymnwmrqhycl.onion']" 2018-01-15 22:04:21,597 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Remote status "swdi5ymnwmrqhycl.onion", False: Timeout 2018-01-15 22:04:21,598 - sdwdate.log - WARNING - Maximum allowed number of failures reached in pool 1 (4 of 14). Giving up. If the problem occurs too frequently, please report it. Sleeping for 10 minutes.

item.title: Time Synch issue
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi iammeeoh

Is this a new Whonix install? If so did you verify the images?

Whonix

VirtualBox/Verify the virtual machine images using the command line

Instructions for OpenPGP Verification of Whonix using Command Line

2018-01-15 22:03:37,963 - sdwdate.log - INFO - Pool 3 last url: bitmailendavkbec.onion, web unixtime: 1516046327, web time: Mon Jan 15 19:58:47 UTC 2018, diff: -7490 seconds

You may need to set UTC time in Whonix manually.

https://whonix.org/wiki/Troubleshooting#Clock_Fix

Use this site as reference to set UTC time:

https://timeanddate.com/worldclock/timezone/utc

Read full topic

item.title: Time Synch issue
item.dc:creator: iammeeoh
item.description:
Hello, I seem to have some problem (the same problem both on Gateway and Workstation) with fetching the time from TOR, that is: running the time syncronization monitor.

It gives me an error and just waits 10 minutes. Here the log taken from the gateway (I am using VirtualBox in MacOSX).

Thank you very much in advance for any help.
